text: Norodom Sihamoni (born 14 May 1953 in Phnom Penh) is Cambodian royalty. He became King of Cambodia after his father, Norodom Sihanouk, abdicated his throne in 2004. His father died in 2012. He is also known for being a peace activist and dance instructor. He is a bachelor. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Current national leaders Category:Cambodian kings
title: Norodom Sihamoni
